Line1.138BED: Edgar has been hiding people from the Knights inside some abandoned buildings south of Caldeum.
Line3.138BED: We thought they would be safe there, but no one is safe from Osric and his Inquisitors. He’ll never stop hunting them.
Line5.138BED: Will you go and help Edgar? He wasn’t always good, but what he’s doing now is. He deserves a chance to atone for his sins.
MenuLabel: “What is this camp you spoke of?”
VoiceDir5.138BED: Suna sees the player as maybe the only force that could keep Edgar from getting killed by Osric.
